content.title: Start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology
content.author: Steve Jobs
content.quote_text: You've gotta start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology.

generation.prompt: Spider-Verse style mixed animation techniques combining multiple visual approaches, comic book halftone dot patterns and Ben-Day dots, dynamic perspective with dimensional depth effects, bold graphic design elements integrated naturally, multiple focal points creating visual rhythm across the frame. Capturing the vibe of clarity, inspiration. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
